Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: The teacher is always better because they have been teaching the subject matter and know what is required for each piece of assessment. But AI is still useful in getting another source of feedback.

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?

Question 42.Question: Describe any other differences between the feedback you received from GenAI and your teacher.
Question 42.Response: AI feedback is better in that it is provided in an instance and you can then continue on or better it. Whereas a teacher takes longer to go through all the work and everyone else in order to then provide feedback
